BSSN Siaga Ancaman Cyber 'Brain Wash'
06 Nov 2019, 15:38 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Foto: internet

Jakarta - Ancaman hoax dan disinformasi yang ada di era cyber menambah panjang daftar tantangan keamanan siber, termasuk dari sisi konsentrasi pada keamanan negara.Kepala Badan Siber dan Sandi Negara (BSSN) Letnan Jendral (Purn.) Hinsa Siburian menjelaskan, sejalan dengan peraturan presiden, BSSN hadir mengatur keamanan cyber yang sesuai UUD 45 untuk melindungi dan memajukan kesejahteraan bangsa."Bila kemungkinan ancaman dari darat, laut dan udara sudah TNI, di masyarakat ada kepolisian, kalau ancaman dari cyber maka BSSN punya tugas untuk itu. Kami ingin menjelaskan keamanan BSSN," jelasnya di sela acara Cyber Security Indonesia 2019, di Assembly Hall Jakarta Convention Center (JCC), Rabu (6/11/2019).Ia menjelaskan, ada ancaman dengan sasaran fisik seperti hardware dan software yang melumpuhkan fungsi pada suatu sistem elektronik. Jadi, ini adalah serangan yang bentuknya menyerang infrastruktur seperti ESDM, TIK, transportasi sampai pemerintahan.


Foto: Aisyah Kamaliah/detikINET

"Ada juga serangan non fisik. Saya rasa sering kita dengar dan memang kita hadapi yaitu yang mengubah mindset dari pihak berkepentingan melakukannya. Kita lihat yang diubah itu pasti emosi, sikap tingkah laku, opini bisa berubah, motif bisa berubah dan bisa membentuk manusia menjadi keinginan yang melakukan galangan," jelas Hinsa.Hinsa menuturkan, tentunya hal ini tak hanya dihadapi Indonesia, namun terjadi di berbagai negara di seluruh dunia. Namun dia juga menegaskan bahwa adanya serangan terhadap keamanan siber, bukan berarti salah dari kemajuan siber itu sendiri."Cyber hanya jadi sarana penyalur informasi dan keinginan pihak yang ingin mengubah. Cyber bisa untuk kebaikan atau sebaliknya untuk hal tertentu," ujarnya."Kita harus memperkuat pusat kekuatan kita, Indonesia dan bagaimana caranya Pancasila jangan dirongrong oleh cyber non fisik ini. Kami harus berkolaborasi dengan semua pihak dan masyarakat Indonesia," tutupnya. Simak Video "Lantik 12 Pejabat Baru, BSSN Ingin Lakukan Pembinaan Karir"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rns/rns)

BSSN Alerts Cyber Threats 'Brain Wash'
Nov 6 2019, 15:38 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Photo: internet

Jakarta - The threat of hoaxes and disinformation in the cyber era adds to the long list of cyber security challenges, including in terms of concentration on state security. BSSN is present regulating cyber security in accordance with the 1945 Constitution to protect and advance the welfare of the nation. "If possible threats from land, sea and air are already TNI, in the community there is a police force, if threats from cyber, BSSN has a duty for that. We want to explain the security of BSSN , "he explained during the 2019 Cyber Security Indonesia event, at the Jakarta Convention Center (JCC) Assembly Hall, Wednesday (11/06/2019). He explained, there were threats with physical targets such as hardware and software that paralyzed functions in an electronic system. So, this is an attack in the form of attacking infrastructure such as ESDM, ICT, transportation to government.


Photo: Aisyah Kamaliah / detikINET

"There are also non-physical attacks. I think we often hear and indeed we face that is changing the mindset of the parties doing it. We see that what is changed must be emotions, attitudes, opinions can change, motives can change and can shape people into desires. who did the shipyard, "Hinsa explained. Hinsa said, of course this was not only faced by Indonesia, but occurred in various countries around the world. But he also stressed that the existence of attacks on cyber security, does not mean one of the progress of cyber itself. "Cyber is only a means of channeling information and the desires of those who want to change. Cyber can be for the good or vice versa for certain things," he said. "strengthen our power center, Indonesia and how Pancasila should not be undermined by this non-physical cyber. We must collaborate with all parties and the people of Indonesia," he concluded.
